vdb.name: orders
vdb.description: Shows how to call an Infinispan local cache

model.name: Orders
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE Orders (OrderObject Object OPTIONS (NAMEINSOURCE 'this', SEARCHABLE 'Unsearchable')) OPTIONS (NAMEINSOURCE 'local-quickstart-cache') ;

model.name: OrdersView
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW OrdersView ( OrderNum integer PRIMARY KEY, OrderDate date, OrderedBy varchar(100) ) AS SELECT o.OrderNum, o.OrderDate, o.OrderedBy FROM Orders as T, OBJECTTABLE( 'x' PASSING T.OrderObject AS x COLUMNS OrderNum integer 'teiid_row.id', OrderDate date 'teiid_row.orderDate', OrderedBy string 'teiid_row.person') as o;
